entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
